mapper.select: /** User.selectUser */ SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, PASSWORD, ACS_IP, INSUR_CD, EML_ADDR, IS_RCV_EML, CELL_NUM, IS_RCV_CELL, IS_APPROVE, IS_DEL, USE_YN, INSRT_ID, INSRT_DATE, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DATE FROM TB_FOR_USER
mapper.insert: /** User.insertNewUser */ INSERT INTO TB_FOR_USER ( USER_ID, USER_NM, PASSWORD, ACS_IP, DPT_NM, OFFICE_TEL_NUM, INSUR_CD, EML_ADDR, IS_RCV_EML, CELL_NUM, IS_RCV_CELL, IS_APPROVE, IS_CHG_PASSWORD, IS_LOCK, USE_YN, IS_DEL INSRT_ID, INSRT_DATE, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userNm}, #{password}, #{acsIp}, #{dptNm}, #{officeTelNum}, #{insurCd}, #{emlAddr}, #{isRcvEml}, #{cellNum}, 'N', 'N', 'N', #{isRcvCell}, 'N', 'Y', #{userId}, now(), #{userId}, now() )
mapper.update: /** User.updateNewPassword */ UPDATE TB_FOR_USER SET IS_CHG_PASSWORD='Y', PASSWORD=#{password}, UPDT_ID=#{userId}, UPDT_DATE=now() WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
